# NouTube: YouTube and YouTube Music in a single app

This repo only contains the desktop releases. Source code and mobile version can be found at https://github.com/nonbili/NouTube. Please report feature requests and bugs there.

Install from Microsoft Store, Flathub or download installers from GitHub.

[<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Microsoft%20Store-15508c.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,"
      alt="Get it on Microsoft Store"
      height="50">](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9n46kk0cqb74)
[<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Flathub-000000?style=for-the-badge&logo=flathub"
      alt="Get it on Flathub"
      hspace="16"
      height="50">](https://flathub.org/apps/jp.nonbili.noutube)
[<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub%20Releases-100000?style=for-the-badge&logo=github"
      alt="Get it on GitHub"
      height="50">](https://github.com/nonbili/NouTube-Desktop/releases/latest)
